entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Scott
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Scott AAFC 05:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
